Package org.eclipse.keyple.core.card.command

Contains the necessary APIs for handling of card Commands.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CardCommand
    Provides the API to get CardCommand's name and instruction byte (INS).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractApduCommandBuilder
    Generic APDU command builder.
    AbstractApduResponseParser
    This abstract class defines the parser used to handle APDU's response.
    AbstractApduResponseParser.StatusProperties
    This internal class provides Status code properties
    AbstractIso7816CommandBuilder
    Iso7816 APDU command builder.

Package org.eclipse.keyple.core.card.command Description

Contains the necessary APIs for handling of card Commands.

It contains Command builders and response parser

The API for observing the plugins is defined by the interface CardCommand CardCommand AbstractApduCommandBuilder AbstractIso7816CommandBuilder AbstractApduResponseParser

KeypleCardCommandException KeypleCardCommandUnknownStatusException

Contains the necessary APIs for observing plugins and readers (used by ticketing applications).

It mainly contains the interfaces of the observable elements and the associated transport POJOs.

The API for observing the plugins is defined by the interface ObservablePlugin and generates events PluginEvent.

The API for observing the readers is defined by the interface ObservableReader and generates events ReaderEvent.
The implementation of the abstract classes AbstractDefaultSelectionsRequest and AbstractDefaultSelectionsResponse is provided by Keyple in the package org.eclipse.keyple.core.card.message.

Since:
0.9
